entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
